content: >http://www.reuters.com/article/worldNews/idUSTRE52I3CD20090319 The former president of the state of Israel Katsav was indicted to-day on charges of rape and other sexual offences against three women. He'll have his day in court and the chance to clear his name against the charges he's accused of committing while Minister of tourism and early in his term as President. No doubt it was either never a problem or one that he has gotten over.

title: Israeli Ex-President Indicted
